front.title: IEEE Recommended Practice for Marine Cable for Use on Shipboard and Fixed or Floating Platforms
front.abstract: Requirements are given for single or multiconductor cables, with or without metal armorand/or jacket, and rated 300 V to 35 kV, intended to be installed aboard marine vessels, fixed andfloating offshore facilities, and in accordance with industry installation standards and the regula-tions of the authorities having jurisdiction (AHJ).
